entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 15.
